name: 陳奕宏
objective:
本課程內容包括質量傳送單元及其應用。
This course contents mass transfer and its application.
學習單元操作中相當重要的氣體吸收、質量傳遞、蒸餾以及相關精餾分離
schedule:
1. 課程介紹
2. Principles of diffusion and mass transfer between phases
3. Principles of diffusion and mass transfer between phases
4. Gas absorption
5. Gas absorption
6. Gas absorption
7. Humidifaction operation 
8. Humidifaction operation
9.期中考
10. Equilibrium-stage operations
11. Equilibrium-stage operations
12. Distillation
13. Distillation
14. Distillation
15. Introduction of multicomponent distillation
16. Introduction of multicomponent distillation
17. Introduction of multicomponent distillation
18. 期末考

平時成績(出缺席、上課態度)：15%
小考：30%
期中考：25%
期末考：30%
